Text: This isn't Broadway or a Soundtrack. It's a set of well-recorded demos for a show that never was. Randy is joined by a host of hot rock and pop singers on most of the tunes.
Thanks Guido. It's not an actual Broadway Soundtrack, but it "might have been." It may be someday with different performers . . . http://www.robertchristgau.com/xg/rock/newman-95.php
